summary: Local Georgian pilot Mimino dreams of flying airplanes for major international airlines. To realize his aspirations, he goes to Moscow where he encounters a fellow comrade from the Caucasus, the Armenian Rubik. Many misadventures ensue.
cast: Vakhtang Kikabidze|Mher Mkrtchyan|Elena Proklova|Evgeniy Leonov|Kote Daushvili|Ruslan Mikaberidze|Zakro Sakhvadze|Marina Dyuzheva|Rusiko Morcheladze|Archil Gomiashvili|Aleksey Alekseev|Vladimir Basov|Zeinab Botsvadze|Borislav Brondukov|Vasili Chkhaidze|Mikaela Drozdovskaya|Sofya Garrel|Lyudmila Gavrilova|Nikolay Grabbe|Anatoliy Ivanov|Arkadiy Ivanov|Eduard Izotov|Artyom Karapetyan|Rene Khobua|Ipolite Khvichia|Zaza Kolelishvili|Saveliy Kramarov|Leonid Kuravlyov|Abesalom Loria|Vladimir Nikitin|Marina Polyak|Vladimir Protasenko|Tatyana Rasputina|Karlo Sakandelidze|Nadezhda Sementsova|Viktor Shulgin|Valentina Titova|Tamari Tvaliashvili|Mikhail Vaskov|Pavel Vinnik|Larisa Barabanova|Vyacheslav Chigarin|Georgiy Daneliya|Herminio de Souza Oliveira|Matti Geschonneck|Sergei Golovanov|Sergey Golovin|Tatyana Ignatova|Olga Kazakova|Shalva Kherkheulidze|Natia Kolelishvili|Viktor Kryuchkov|Raisa Kurkina|Tatyana Kuznetsova|Taisiya Litvinenko|Pyotr Lyubeshkin|Akaki Mesablishvili|Aleksandr Novikov|Tatyana Parkina|Anatoliy Petritskiy|Mikhail Rozanov|Vadim Spiridonov|Vladimir Tkalich|Mirza Ukleba|Aleksandr Yanvaryov
title: Mimino
